channel.title: Software Engineering on generic test domain

item.title: The applications of Top Gun to software engineering
item.description: The Merriam-Webster dictionary defines Top Gun as ‘a 1986 American romantic military action drama film directed by Tony Scott’. This definition might serve us well at the local pub quiz, but there is much more to learn about this film. During a recent viewing, I realised that there were a large number of useful parallels and not so parallels between the disciplines of piloting fighter aircraft in 80’s action films and developing robust software.
